name: Salt and Stone California Mint Lip Balm 0.15oz
description:

This balm combines organic ingredients like extra virgin olive oil, extra virgin coconut oil and beeswax.Cruelty free.Matte finish.Ingredients: beeswax*, extra virgin coconut oil*, extra virgin olive oil*, peppermint essential oil*. *Organic.
